medical_history.chief_complaint: Juvenile onset hereditary motor and sensory neuropathy accompanied by open-angle glaucoma.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Patient 1 experienced impaired vision at age 6 requiring surgery for glaucoma. At age 13, he noted increasing difficulty in walking. Patient 2 also had surgery for glaucoma at age 6 and began experiencing weakness leading to falls around age 13. Patient 3 reported insidious onset of muscle weakness in the lower limbs beginning at age 6.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Both parents of the patients were normal on clinical and ophthalmologic examination. CSF analysis showed elevated protein in all three patients.
medical_history.family_history: Consanguineous marriage in the family (both parents are first cousins). There is a history of similar symptoms in the family.
medical_history.social_history: The family originates from a small village on an island (Amami Ohshima) in Japan.
